alert.note: Alert for Elko; Eureka (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 16 at 6:09AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by snowmelt continues. * WHERE...Portions of north central Nevada and northeast Nevada, including the following counties, in north central Nevada, Eureka. In northeast Nevada, Elko. * WHEN...Until 200 PM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 603 AM PDT, Snowmelt continues across the area causing flooding of some small streams and creeks. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Pine Valley, Palisade and SR-278. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
